text: allaha ta'ala'e uttama vata avatarita kari che, je evi kitaba che ke ekabija sathe malati ane varanvara padhavamam avati ayato che, jenathi te lokona runvata ubha tha'i jaya che, je'o potana palanaharathi dare che, chevate temana sarira ane hrdaya allahani yadathi narama padi jaya che, a che allaha ta'alanum margadarsana, jena dvara jene icche, satya marga batave che ane jene allaha ta'ala ja marga bhulavi de, tene marga batavanara ko'i nathi
